description: This armored undead human wields a heavy mace and wears the trappings of a devil-worshiper.

sections.body: A mythic lich is an undead spellcaster who gave up standard mythic path abilities in favor of abilities that preserve her existence and enhance her unnatural power.

name: Lich, Mythic
skills: Heal +16, Intimidate +18, Knowledge (arcana, religion) +18, Perception +29, Sense Motive +27, Spellcraft +26, Stealth +9
